pages.text: Used to accelerate the process of purifying crystals, which allows you to create Pure Certus Quartz Crystal, Pure Nether Quartz Crystal and Pure Fluix Crystal.$(br2)Must be powered by an ME Network via the top or bottom, and consumes a steady 8 ae/t while plugged in. Crystal Seeds must be in an adjacent water block to be effected, the seeds will shimmer more rapidly when in the presence of a powered Crystal Growth Accelerator.$(br2)Can only connect to cables, or other networked machines on the top and bottom of the machine.
